title: Tombstoning
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: 'Livingstone Place, just across the Meadows. It's one street along from our own flat, in Gladstone Terrace.'

title: The Waiting
author: Claire, Regi
snippet: Rather than traipse round the park in the twilight and risk  another encounter with the Hawk, I head over to Melville Drive  and what used to be my digs on Gladstone Terrace. No litter here  for my scavenger, merely a straight line of frost-webbed maples  and garden walls, perfect for leg-cockings.

title: Tombstoning
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: 'How was the party, then, madam?' Nicola asked, taking Amy's hand and turning up Gladstone Terrace towards home.
